They had three sons - Dadi (Adrian Pang), Dashan (San Yow) and Daqiu (Cavin Soh). Zhou Dong disappeared after a kidnap attempt went awry; not even his body was found.

programme.title: A Medical Journey - EP 2

programme.title: Portrait Of Home - EP 36
programme.desc: The Fishball factory Tong Xin Yuan is a successful local business, with thriving sales in both Singapore and overseas. But behind the company lies a dark mystery. The founder of Tong Xin Yuan, Zhou Dong (Chen Shucheng), married a beautiful factory worker Li Tian (Louise Li) many years ago. They had three sons - Dadi (Adrian Pang), Dashan (San Yow) and Daqiu (Cavin Soh). Zhou Dong disappeared after a kidnap attempt went awry; not even his body was found.

programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Expose Mistik: Kisah Seram - EP 27

programme.title: Sape Terer - EP 3
programme.desc: Sape Terer merupakan 'game show' terbaharu yang mempertemukan artis otai dan artis baharu bersaing merebut gelaran juara setiap episod.

programme.title: Bila Kau Datang
programme.desc: Kehadiran seorang kanak-kanak perempuan dalam hidup seorang lelaki mencetus seribu tanda tanya, namun juga memutikkan semula suatu hubungan yang cukup istimewa.

programme.title: M.A.I.D - EP 19
programme.desc: Noorul meminta kerja sebagai orang gaji melalui agensi pekerjaan setelah kilang tempat kerjanya ditutup. Bermulalah episod Noorul sebagai orang gaji kepada anak Tan Sri yang sangat cerewet itu.

programme.title: Mystery Ranking Show Malaysia - EP 4
programme.desc: Saksikan panel pembongkar menyusun kedudukan lima peserta dengan tema dan persembahan bakat berbeza setiap minggu.Berjaya atau tidak para panel menyusun kedudukan dengan betul?

programme.title: Fan Fanatik - EP 9

programme.title: RAI - EP 8
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah-kisah masyarakat setempat

programme.desc: Saksikan rancangan komedi spontan yang pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga

programme.title: Lawak Boss Boss - EP 2
programme.desc: Bersama Zizan Razak dan CEO syarikat terkenal dan bagaimanakah mereka melakukan cabaran dan bermain permainan menarik?

programme.title: Otai Can Do It! - EP 1
programme.desc: Saksikan selebriti Otai melakukan suatu cabaran yang tidak pernah mereka lakukan sebelum ini! Selain kemampuan fizikal dan mental, mampukah selebriti ini melaksanakan semua tugasan yang diberi?

programme.title: Saka Sisters - EP 3
programme.desc: Laila & Suri baru saja kematian Ayah. Mereka dikejutkan dengan kehadiran saka. Jamal, ekori mereka ke mana saja. Laila & Suri yang selama ini tidak rapat, terpaksa selesaikan hal Jamal bersama-sama.

programme.title: Lawak Ke Dik? - EP 8
programme.desc: Program untuk kanak-kanak bagi menyuarakan pendapat dan berkongsi buah fikiran mereka secara spontan.

programme.desc: Kiah masih sibuk dengan perniagaan pekasamnya. Dia masih menghadapi masalah apabila bekas suaminya dan keluarga datang ke kampungnya.

programme.title: Kiah Mai Pulak - EP 6
programme.desc: Kiah masih sibuk dengan perniagaan pekasamnya. Dia masih menghadapi masalah apabila bekas suaminya dan keluarga datang ke kampungnya.

programme.title: Bonda Bonding - EP 17

programme.title: Lukisan Cinta
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Khairul dan Natasha saling mencintai tetapi ditentang bapa Natasha kerana Khairul memilih kerjaya sebagai pelukis. Apakah kesudahan cinta mereka?

programme.title: Dalang Prank S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan hiburan prank yang melibatkan artis dan peserta yang menjadi dalang kepada prank masing-masing. Prank yang disukai oleh penonton akan dinobatkan Juara Dalang Prank dalam setiap episod.

programme.title: Jihan Show - EP 12
programme.desc: Riuh rendah dibuatnya apabila Jihan berkumpul dengan teman-teman. Pelbagai topik jadi perbualan bila semua "girlfriends" bersatu.

programme.title: Makhluk Manis Dalam Bis - EP 11

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali - EP 14

programme.title: Super Game Boy The Series - EP 13

programme.desc: Inspector Prabha Narayan arrests Aditya Kashyap for the murder of a social worker. They fall in love while investigating the case and uncover the mystery behind Aditya's father's death. Release Year: 2002 Director: Amol Shetge

programme.title: Dil Kabaddi
programme.desc: Set in Mumbai, witness the story of two couples as they decide to deal with the boredom of marriage and lost love. Will a separation be enough, or are there more twists on the way? Release Year: 2008 Director: Anil Sharma

programme.title: Bamfaad
programme.desc: A passionate love story set in Allahabad between Naate and Neelam who meet accidentally and fall in love. They make brave choices and go through a path of love and loss to be with each other. Release Year: 2020 Director: Ranjan Chandel

programme.title: Happy Happy Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Happy, a young man, wishes to marry a wealthy woman in order to win a challenge. However, in a bid to woo her, he makes up a fake family.

programme.title: Bahubali: The Beginning
programme.desc: In the kingdom of Mahishmati, while pursuing his love, Shivudu learns about the conflict-ridden past of his family and his legacy. He must now prepare himself to face his new-found archenemy.

programme.title: Shaitaan (2024)
programme.desc: A family outing takes a terrifying turn when an intruder takes over the body of the teenage daughter, putting her at the mercy of increasingly sinister orders.

programme.title: Main Hoon Lucky The Racer
programme.desc: Lucky, a city guy, has everything. His life changes altogether when he meets Siva Reddy, a dangerous politician. Lucky decides to destroy to reputation of the politician with the help of his brother.

programme.title: Andaz Apna Apna
programme.desc: Amar and Prem, who belong to middle-class families, compete to win over Raveena, a millionaire's daughter. Along the way, they run into a local gangster, Teja, who turns their lives upside down.

programme.title: The Making Of Bewakoofiyaan
programme.desc: Watch behind the scenes and meet the cast and crew of the movie.

programme.title: Wazir

programme.title: Jhootha Kahin Ka

programme.title: Koi Jaane Na
programme.desc: A heartbroken writer struggling with writer's block goes to a hill station where he finds love again but uncovers a copycat serial killer who has mysteriously come alive.

programme.title: All The Best: Fun Begins
programme.desc: The unexpected arrival of his elder NRI brother and assorted characters complicates the life of a Goan male.

programme.title: Mubarakan
programme.desc: Identical twin brothers turn to their eccentric uncle for help to make sure that they each marry the woman they love.

programme.title: Bhaiyya Ji

programme.title: Toolsidas Junior

programme.title: Luv Ki Arrange Marriage

programme.desc: Raj, Pooja and Jhanvi are in a complicated love triangle. Pooja and Jhanvi love Raj. Raj loves Jhanvi but is misunderstood as Pooja's husband by their family. How will the confusion clear off?

programme.desc: Watch behind the scenes and meet the cast and crew of the movie.

programme.desc: Destiny plays a cruel role in Sevanthi's naive and sheltered life with her dream-come-true husband Mano and his extended family. Watch Sevanthi traverse the nuances of family, despite the challenges life throws at her.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace & heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds & win over her husband's large family.

programme.title: ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gautham's controlling aunt Bairavi & her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her familys financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the familys peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Movie - MOUNA GEETHANGAL_x000D_
programme.desc: A woman realises she is pregnant after she divorces her husband for having an affair. Many years later, her husband enters her life, eager to reunite with her.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Movie Contd - MOUNA GEETHANGAL
programme.desc: A woman realises she is pregnant after she divorces her husband for having an affair. Many years later, her husband enters her life, eager to reunite with her.

programme.title: RAMAYANAM
programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Annam
programme.desc: Exuding warmth & courage, self-reliant Annam, living with an estranged father and a cruel stepmother, longs for a loving bond to escape her home. Will she find the love she seeks?

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her familys happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Ranjani
programme.desc: Raised in a strict home, Ranjani found happiness solely in the company of four boys from her neighbourhood. As she grew up, their friendship meant the world to her. Can she find love while upholding their close bonds amidst family and social constraints?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.desc: Anjali and Vicky are two different individuals who approaches life differently, they both meet each other at a point where completely interesting lead begins.

programme.title: Sortez-Moi De Moi - EP 2
programme.desc: Justine and emile are going through a difficult period. Louie confronts David about his misconduct. Gabriel is given some upsetting news, following a call to intervene in a domestic dispute.

programme.title: Femmes De L'art - EP 6
programme.desc: It was said of her that: ''Eve had finally become Adam's equal''. A society artist, liberated and uninhibited in the Paris of the interwar years, Lempicka mainly painted female nudes and portraits, mixing a modern aesthetic and mannerism, in the style of the Roaring Twenties.

programme.title: La Vie Revee Des Autres
programme.desc: Franck and Karine abandon everything to settle in the mountains. On their arrival, their chalet isn't available. The property developers offer them an alternative, but it's far from being what they wanted. Little by little, bitterness and jealousy take hold, poisoning their relationship, until the irreparable happens.

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 20
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: C'est Du Belge
programme.desc: Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Jardin Extraordinaire - EP 7
programme.desc: Surrounded by scientific advisers and commentators, Tanguy Dumortier covers the natural world and the environment through reports and unpublished documents.

programme.title: Les Travaux Et Les Jours
programme.desc: Young and connected, the Cistercian nuns of the Sainte-Marie de Boulaur Abbey, in the Occitanie region, live through their faith and from their agricultural production. In order to remain independent, they have launched the building of a modern, environmentally-friendly barn, a construction project they will be supervising themselves.

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Les Saisons De Pique-Assiette - EP 11
programme.desc: Showcasing Italian cuisine. On the menu: pasta e fagioli, or pasta with beans.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 42
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 43
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 23
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 38
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 37
programme.desc: Marcus is determined to quickly find a treatment for the mutants thanks to Leo's resistant protein. Stef returns from the rehabilitation camp a changed man, which greatly concerns Alex.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Les Saisons De Pique-Assiette - EP 11
programme.desc: Showcasing Italian cuisine. On the menu: pasta e fagioli, or pasta with beans.

programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Dans Un Territoire Pres De Chez Vous - EP 6
programme.desc: Accompanied by the guide Benoit Croteau and his daughter elie, Brad tries his hand at canoe camping near Pikogan in Anicinape Aki. Between fishing for sturgeon and running the rapids, the Harricana River offers the perfect opportunity to pass on traditional knowledge.

programme.title: Temps Present
programme.desc: 'Temps Present'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Crime Lui Va Si Bien - EP 8
programme.desc: As Police Lieutenant Richer returns from leave, she finds the police station buzzing. Her partner, Captain Molina, has disappeared without trace. An internal investigation is launched: she is suspected of stealing evidence concerning a hold-up. Even worse, there is good reason to believe someone is out to kill her.

programme.title: Sibovoyage - EP 3
programme.desc: Totally transformed over a very short period of time: Tangiers and Rabat, two of Morocco's must-visit cities, successfully crossed into the 21st century and positioned themselves as the cultural avant-garde of North Africa, whilst losing none of their ancient charm and the attraction of their seaside.

programme.title: Objectif Monde - EP 4
programme.desc: 'Objectif Monde'' proposes special reports and investigations into societal or geopolitical issues, taking the time to analyse the situations thanks to different specialist opinions. This TV5MONDE programme is produced with French-speaking partners (RTBF, RTS, Radio-Canada, France Televisions) and the support of the public French-speaking media.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi - EP 28
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Les Petits Meurtres D'agatha Christie
programme.desc: The head of a luxury empire, Pierre Baldini, is savagely assassinated. He was just about to disinherit his only daughter; she finds herself targeted by the police. Greco needs to keep a cool head in this case which takes her back in time.

programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Dans Un Territoire Pres De Chez Vous - EP 6
programme.desc: Accompanied by the guide Benoit Croteau and his daughter elie, Brad tries his hand at canoe camping near Pikogan in Anicinape Aki. Between fishing for sturgeon and running the rapids, the Harricana River offers the perfect opportunity to pass on traditional knowledge.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Chacun Son Ile - EP 3
programme.desc: Situated in the Amazon River delta in the north-east of Brazil, Marajo Island is as big as Switzerland. It is very beautiful but often flooded due to the currents and intense rainfall. The inhabitants are particularly resourceful and they manage to adapt. Here, even the fish swim through the trees.

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: La Cuisine Des Mousquetaires - EP 19
programme.desc: On today's menu: the traditional lamb tajine.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Dans Un Territoire Pres De Chez Vous - EP 6
programme.desc: Accompanied by the guide Benoit Croteau and his daughter elie, Brad tries his hand at canoe camping near Pikogan in Anicinape Aki. Between fishing for sturgeon and running the rapids, the Harricana River offers the perfect opportunity to pass on traditional knowledge.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 44
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 45
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 24
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 39
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 38
programme.desc: After coming back empty-handed from her expedition with Bertrand to find Julianne, Nicky learns that Lila has kidnapped Mr Agrotek! The young kidnapper promises her sister that she'll get her hostage talking very quickly...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: La Cuisine Des Mousquetaires - EP 19
programme.desc: On today's menu: the traditional lamb tajine.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Chateau ! - EP 8
programme.desc: Unique in France, the only chateau built in the form of a bridge, the walls of the Chateau de Chenonceau enclose innumerable captivating stories from times past. The Chateau de Talcy, with its poetic inspiration, offers an enchanting refuge.

programme.title: Face Aux Territoires - EP 12
programme.desc: A key personality from the world of politics, economics, trade unions... answers questions from the regional press on local, national and international current affairs.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 12
programme.desc: Latin America is a political construction which developed in the 19th century. From Mexico to Argentina: the 20 countries forming Latin America are very diverse. What do huge Brazil and Mexico have in common with tiny Salvador? What is its diplomatic line on the world stage?

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Specialiste
programme.desc: Hud, a notorious gunslinger, heads for Blackstone to avenge his brother Charlie, lynched by a mob who accused him of stealing from the bank. Convinced of Charlie's innocence, Hud investigates. But no one's talking and the loot is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: Donovan S'evade
programme.desc: Donovan, a bodyguard, is given the job of protecting the wife of a government minister, on holiday with friends. In doing so the young man discovers a life to which he has never been entitled.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: TV5MONDE, the global French language network, offers the best television programmes from France, Belgium, Switzerland and Canada.

programme.title: Movie - Mappillai (Old)
programme.desc: Rajeshwari agrees to get her daughter Gayathri married to her beau Saravanan, thinking him to be subservient. But her plans are foiled when she realises that he has a violent past.

programme.title: Movie - Kadhal
programme.desc: A mechanic elopes to Chennai with a rich schoolgirl, but the girl's persistent family won't leave them alone. Soon, the married couple is deceptively separated and the schoolgirl is married to someone else.

programme.title: Movie - Mudhal Udhayam
programme.desc: Cheenu lives in a colony with his father. He opposes a local politician Naina, who terrorizes people. When Cheenu's father is killed, he joins Naina to find the killer without knowing the reality.

programme.title: Movie - Singara Chittu
programme.desc: Murali marries Raji against the wishes of his mother. Worsening conditions force him to move out with his wife and kid. All plans to begin life anew come to a halt due to an unexpected turn of events.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Nalla Kaalam Poranthachu
programme.desc: Thangamuthu, a labourer, struggles to get an eye operation done for his mother, whose wish is to see him get married and settle down with his family.

programme.title: Movie - Maayan
programme.desc: Maayan cannot bear the sufferings of his villagers at the hands of the feudal lords of pre-independence India. He turns into a messiah of the downtrodden and the worst enemy of the rich and wealthy.

programme.title: Movie - Vetrivel Shakthivel
programme.desc: Although he has cleared his IPS, a man's father asks him to work in their clothing store. He loves a woman very much, but her past poses a problem. Also, his father may be connected to a terrorist outfit.

programme.title: Movie - Vaaimaye Vellum
programme.desc: Raja is hired by a journalist, who is investigating the kidnapping of rich children, to protect his daughter. In turn, Raja earns the enmity of the criminals behind the operation.

programme.title: Movie - Kutti Puli
programme.desc: Kutti Puli is a happy-go-lucky, good-hearted ruffian, whose mother wants him to settle down. Our hero does not believe in love or marriage till he meets Bharathy. But his enemies will not allow him to lead a respectful family life.

programme.title: Movie - Yuvan Yuvathy
programme.desc: Kathir and Nisha, who want to settle abroad, fall for each other. However, when he decides to propose to her, she informs him that she is all set to marry another man in the USA.

programme.title: Movie - Pattikattu Thambi
programme.desc: This movie stars Arjun, Nirosha, S.S. Chandran and Rajesh, and is directed by Senthilnathan.

programme.title: Movie - Thozhan
programme.desc: Thozhan is a 2007 Tamil-language musical action drama film directed by V. M. Vinu, starring Jayaram and Vimala Raman in the lead roles.

programme.title: Movie - Paadu Nilave
programme.desc: When Balakrishnan, a police constable, expresses his love to a renowned singer, she rejects his advances. Balakrishnan feels insulted and decides to exact revenge on her.

programme.title: Movie - Enaintha Kaikal
programme.desc: At the request of a desperate mother, an ex-army man sets out to rescue her son who is being held in a military prison. Another man is on a mission to kidnap that prisoner and kill the ex-army man.

programme.title: Movie - Vetri Vizha
programme.desc: After a fatal accident, a man suffers from amnesia. However, when flashes from his past help him discover his combat skills, he sets out on a mission to find his true identity.

programme.title: Movie - Pandavar Bhoomi
programme.desc: A man returns to his ancestral village after many years only to find his house in a dilapidated state and decides to rebuild it. The engineer he brings in to do the work gets really close to his family members.

programme.title: ASO Sailing Programming 2024
programme.desc: The Vende Globe is a single-handed, non-stop, non-assisted round-the-world sailing race that takes place every 4 years. The skippers set off from Les Sables-d'Olonne in Vende and sail around 45,000 kilometres around the globe, rounding the three legendary capes (Good Hope, Leeuwin and finally Cape Horn) before returning to Les Sables d'Olonne. The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Nkazimulo Zulu vs. Jake Hadley
programme.desc: This episode features a flyweight championship bout as Jake Hadley takes on the veteran Nkazimulo Zulu. Bonus coverage includes Mutuale Basambombo vs. HP Van Staden and Christian Bobo vs. Adrian Sanchez.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Nate Campbell vs. Ali Funeka
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features lightweights Nate Campbell, aka 'The Galaxy Warrior', (32-1, 25 KOs) vs. Ali 'Rush Hour' Funeka (30-1, 25 KOs) from the BankAtlantic Center in Sunrise, Florida, USA, on February 14, 2009 in a bout viewed on television by 1.2 million.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 11: Bangkok, Thailand - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Muay Thai and Martial Art of Punches, Kicks, Elbows and Knees with Masters Thakoon Pongsupha and Karim Pattana.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs Orlando Lora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman facing off with Orlando Lora. A left hook and right uppercut combination ends this fight. Also on the card, action from former heavyweight champion James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Tamawashi, Myogiryu, Takanoiwa and Yoshikaze from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Zagreb Grand Prix, where some of the young Judo fans get the opportunity to train with former Olympic champion Mark Huizinga and triple world champion Illias Iliadis. Plus we watch as Judo's biggest star Teddy Riner competes in the +100 kg division.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Chris Arreola vs. Tomasz Adamek
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavyweight collision between Chris Arreola and Tomasz Adamek in a battle of one-loss competitors. Also on the card, Rocky Jearez takes on Jorge Barrios before a gruesome cut calls an end to the fight.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo

programme.title: FS MMA Fernando Rodrigues Jr. vs. Karol Bedorf
programme.desc: In this edition of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we highlight the Main Event of KSW 37, featuring Fernando Rodrigues Jr. of Brazil taking on local favorite Karol Bedorf of Poland. programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The next season opens with a qualifying round in Venice Beach, California. More than half of the obstacles used on this season were never seen before, and this premiere features exciting new challenges such as the Frame Slider, Domino Hill, Chain Swing and Flying Nun Chucks. Returning fan favorites in Venice Beach include parkour enthusiasts Kyle Cochran and Brent Steffensen.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 19
programme.desc: Duggee and the squirrels take a boat down the river to deliver a package.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 20
programme.desc: The squirrels are full of energy so Duggee calms them down with some Yoga!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 21
programme.desc: The squirrels are busy making collections of their favourite things.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 22
programme.desc: There has been a power cut and the squirrels use their torches to make shadows.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 23
programme.desc: Duggee and the squirrels help to put on an amateur dramatic show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 1
programme.desc: The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 2
programme.desc: The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 3
programme.desc: When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 4
programme.desc: Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 24
programme.desc: Happy discovers his wobbly tooth has come out, but he's lost it!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 25
programme.desc: The Squirrels are rushing around, so Duggee shows them how to take a slower pace.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 26
programme.desc: The squirrels compete in the annual Animal Obstacle Course Race.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing dress up when they hear a ghostly sound. What is going on?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 28
programme.desc: Duggee teaches the squirrels all about the stars, the planets and the Milky Way!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 29
programme.desc: Duggee and the squirrels harvest the seeds they planted some time ago.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 30
programme.desc: Duggee is painting in his favourite colouring book. The Squirrels want to have a go too.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 31
programme.desc: Duggee and the squirrels prepare for a campfire by collecting sticks of all sizes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 32
programme.desc: Duggee explains why animals all have different voices.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 33
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels are out doing a bit of sailing. What fun!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 34

programme.desc: The squirrels learn all about where water comes from.

programme.desc: When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 57
programme.desc: Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 58
programme.desc: The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 31
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening at the farm - all Farmer Tom's lettuces have been painted pink! Farmer Tom is really upset so Noddy offers to investigate. After talking to PatPat and Smartysaurus he realises that the Ninjas had asked Smartysaurus to make them pink paint so that they could paint the lettuces. They were using them as pom-poms to cheerlead Pink Ninja as she ran the Toyland Marathon Race! The Ninjas are very sorry that they upset Farmer Tom but he tells them that it's alright.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 32
programme.desc: When some pieces from Big Ears' jigsaw puzzle go missing, Noddy investigates: where are the missing pieces? He soon realises someone must have taken them and draws up a list of suspects. Having discounted the Pirates and then the Naughticorns, Noddy is baffled. But when Pat-Pat and the Pockets invite him to share a piece of toy cake, Noddy suddenly has a breakthrough: maybe it wasn't one toy who took lots of pieces but lots of toys who each took one piece.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 31
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Leopard didn't have spots. All the animals had something special; Lion had his mane, Peacock his beautiful tail, Zebra his stripes but Leopard was as plain as plain can be. Then one day Leopard made friends with Puff Adder with his bright colourful spots. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 32
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Hyena didn't have short back legs. He was always chasing around and nipping other animals on the bottom. Then one day the animals had enough. It was time to teach that naughty Hyena a lesson! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 31
programme.desc: Conrod is visiting Silver Hatch to try out some new bio fuel. But Big Chris fears something is wrong with it after he comes out in spots after sampling a smoothie made from the same produce. What or who could be at fault?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 32
programme.desc: The cars are having a football tournament down at the beach. FB learns that if he relaxes, his natural footballing skills will shine through.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, theyre invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 39
programme.desc: Its another adventure with Tag and Scooch dressed up as their favorite comic book characters: Chaser and Chewer! But this time, bad guy Thunder (Frank) is asking for their help, because Flea (Beans) is trying to take over the town on his own. / When Tag and Scooch find out Wagnes has always dreamt of becoming a famous country music singer, they decide to make her dream come true.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus - EP 1
programme.desc: _x000D_ _x000D_When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvins time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didnt work quite how theyd hoped.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless "Heart of Fire Ruby" a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that they'll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaad's haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: Madly Madagascar S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost of Lord Farquaad S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel whereShrekand Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounterLord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Megamind: The Button of Doom S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: After one "button" unleashes the gigantic robot MEGA-MEGAmind on Metro City, MegaMind and Minion must rely on their old tricks to restore order.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins from Outer Space S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 33
programme.desc: It's Fable Forest Rainbow Day when the big rainbow in Fable Forest sparkles and pops like a giant firework. Everyone is looking forward to it until the colours start fading from the rainbow! Noddy needs to investigate before the rainbow disappears for good! Revs converts into a helicopter so that Noddy and Bumpy can fly over the rainbow to find the pot of rainbow gold. They discover that Cloppycorn has been taking the gold from the pot to give his unicorn horn a special golden glow.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 34
programme.desc: When Noddy sees Deltoid flying in the air he decides to investigate: how can they get Deltoid down? Realising that magic is involved, Noddy goes to see Queen Sparklewings to see if she can help but she tells him her wand has gone missing. Someone must be trying to do magic with her wand! Meanwhile more flying toys appear, first Fuse and then Smartysaurus.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 33
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Ants didn't work together. The Ants desperately wanted to build themselves a home, but all the animals kept sitting on them, or sneezing them far away or swooping them up into tall trees! On the point of giving up, one brave, young soldier ant rallies the troops "Pamoja! Together! Together they can do anything!!!" and he was right. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 34
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Flea didn't jump. Flea didn't really move at all. She was very big and very round. All Flea wanted to do was to see the world. The Tinga Tinga animals try to help lift Flea high up, but she is too heavy. Then Tortoise comes up with an idea Movement and activity!' and after many attempts Flea discovers that she can jump. She can jump really high! Then Flea can jump everywhere and see everything.! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! programme.title: Phrogging: Hider In My House - EP 9

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of days early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Money Movers

Capturing the energy of days early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBCs Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBCs Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBCs "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for todays Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to todays markets and investors. CNBCs deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBCs "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for todays Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to todays markets and investors. CNBCs deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the days agenda. Airing CNBCs award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the days agenda. Airing CNBCs award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBCs Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBCs Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrows trading day.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime

Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrows trading day.

programme.title: Asia Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Squawk Box" is CNBCs flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Asia Street Signs
programme.desc: Anchored by Tanvir Gill at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Street Signs" follows the day's biggest moves to provide CNBC's audience with actionable, real-time insights. From the anchor desk to trading desks around the region, "Street Signs" helps viewers capitalize on the plays of the day.

programme.title: Us Fast Money (recorded) 2024
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is Americas post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Capital Connection
programme.desc: Hosted by Dan Murphy at NASDAQ Dubai, "Capital Connection" gives you a reading on Asia's markets mid-day and sets you up for the Middle East and European trading day.

programme.title: Europe Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Steve Sedgwick, Karen Tso and Arabile Gumede, CNBCs flagship show leads you into and delivers the open of the European markets. Featuring leading business executives, financial strategists and fund managers, "Squawk Box" provides original points of view and instant analysis of the latest business and market news.

programme.title: Europe Street Signs
programme.desc: One hour into Europes equity session, "Street Signs" provides the street's view and a link to business stories trending online and on social. Bridging the European and U.S. trading days across asset classes, it breaks key economic data in Europe and provides live price action in the biggest moving stocks, bonds, currencies and commodities.

programme.title: Europe Street Signs

programme.title: Us Worldwide Exchange
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBCs "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Frank Holland, the program prepares CNBCs worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

programme.title: Us Squawk Box
programme.desc: "Squawk Box" is the ultimate pre-market morning news and talk program, where the biggest names in business and politics tell their most important stories. Anchored by Joe Kernen, Becky Quick and Andrew Ross Sorkin, the show brings Wall Street to Main Street. It's a must-see for everyone from the professional trader to the casual investor.

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars. How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the world's most advanced, intelligent, robots. Will the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improve the human experience, or end it?

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing our capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way we use our minds forever.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the world's most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour S4
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Kaya Rasa
programme.desc: A documentary program that discussesabout a journey of a chef who explores a secret ingredient in a dish.

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: Apose S1
programme.desc: APOSE: ANAK PODCAST SEJATI tells the story of a podcaster's work life both on air and behind the scenes. In this series, there is a star podcaster who will interview a number of sources who will be present at the office.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTNs Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on whats relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Rediscovering China
programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. With unrivalled access to the country's people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China._x000D__x000D_

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: China 24

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xins very own unique perspective. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing Chinas perspective, policies and stories. programme.title: Information Worth Knowing from the News Commentator Bureau
programme.desc: The commentators present trending news, its background, and engaging information related to daily life in an easy-to -understand manner.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Come Come Everybody" Encore Eps. 24
programme.desc: In 1925, radio broadcasting was initiated in Japan and soon after, a program for English language learners began. This is a family drama depicting 100 years of three generations who lived with this English radio program; Yasuko who was born on the same day as the radio broadcasting started, her child Rui, and grandchild Hinata. Listening to the radio, these three heroines find their own ways of living overcoming hardships.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Omusubi" Eps. 59 (R)
programme.desc: A Heisei youth graffiti drama, in which the heroine Yoneda Yui (Hashimoto Kanna), born in the first year of the Heisei era, connects people's hearts to the future as a nutritionist. Always cherishing her individuality, she sometimes struggles, but powerfully and joyfully pushes through the turbulent Heisei and Reiwa eras.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: News Around Japan
programme.desc: Program introduces the latest news from all over Japan.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: World Music Album
programme.desc: A 5-minute music program introducing classical music.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Asagaya House: Update Your Thinking
programme.desc: The light and easy talk show hosted by comedy duo Asagaya Shimai. Residents with different nationalities, ages, and genders of the 'Asagaya House', a fictional residence, talk about the current and familiar topics and may update your thinking.

programme.title: Fun with Okinawa Dialects
programme.desc: Get familiar with Okinawa dialects by listening to folk tales and children's songs.

programme.title: History Detective (R)
programme.desc: A historical documentary program starring an actor Sato Jiro as a boss of a history detective agency. Conducting on-site investigations and scientific simulations, Jiro and his detective team dig into and uncover the truth from historic mystery.

programme.title: Fish Masters (R)
programme.desc: A variety program exploring the mysterious world of fish with the fish expert Sakana-kun.

programme.title: City-Scope
programme.desc: This program solves little mysteries we encounter in the town every day, making use of time-warping and clairvoyant power of the special goggle 'city-scope'.

programme.title: Peek-a-boo
programme.desc: Bringing out potential and capability of children aged 0 to 2 years by stimulating their feelings with pictures and sound.

programme.title: With Mother
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: 1-Minute Anime: Songs for SDGs
programme.desc: Lets learn about SDGs while singing along! A selected goal out of 17 will be introduced in each one-minute song with animation.

programme.title: Kid's Discovery
programme.desc: In this program, children around the age of 4 can experience the pleasure of playing with friends, the wonder of life, the joy of doing thigs by themselves, and consideration for others, all while having fun through various discoveries.

programme.title: Whiz-Kids TV
programme.desc: Lets cooperate with TV warriors and take on various missions to revive the symbol tree of "Geoworld," a mysterious otherworldly realm rich in nature!

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: NHK News 7 (B)
programme.desc: NHK's core news program wrapping up the day's events in an easy to understand way.

programme.title: The "Instruction Manual" Show "Potato"
programme.desc: A unique theater show in which the showman chooses one item of the world and presents how to use or operate it with some surprising facts and useful tips that might 'update' your life.

programme.title: Lunch ON!
programme.desc: Lunch ON! offers insights into working people of all kinds, by looking at their lunch. Discover what they eat as they strive to reach new heights!

programme.title: NHK News 845

programme.title: News Watch 9 (B)
programme.desc: NHK's mainstay evening news program.

programme.title: The Last Steep Ascent - EP 22
programme.desc: In his youth, Miu Tin encountered bride-to-be Koo Sun-Yuet, who has lingered in his mind ever since. Twenty years later, the two meet again.
